name: Tey Al Tool
description: Tey-Al-Tool is an ongoing digital self-expression project. In this project, I try to make realtime self-portraits based on my individual experiences of working with computer software/hardware and find a digital aesthetic on my current situation and an Idea. Working with myself in a virtual space as a 3D element, designing, animating, creating an environment, and programming on this element makes me also an audience of this project, this process could be a digital self-observing! Tey-al-tool project developing as a computer game and some VR experiences..
